page.title: 04FARLETON AND CLAUGHTON
page.content: oth are commuter hamlets for Lancaster nd Morecambe.Farleton comprises 32 privately owned individually designed and mainly modern detached houses and bungalows,converted barns and modernised former farmhouses as well as 1 farm all of which situated along a cul-de-sac off the A683.A garage does mechanical repairs and panel beating to cars.Claughton has 59 houses strung along the A683 including 10 old terraced houses,built for brickworks employees,and 6 semi-detached council houses,a development of detached houses of various kinds.There are a church,hotel/restaurant,inn and village institute.Children go to playgroup, primary and secondary school in Hornby and Lancaster.Everyday shopping is done in Hornby and Caton,shopping for bulk food,clothes and furniture in Lancaster The car is the main mode of transport
